Html:
Hi Guys,

I am not sure If I am possibly doing something wrong.

But I am having troubles getting my app to run correctly.

I have a booking editor view, in which I can create bookings. I am using Prism and Unity;

The first time the application starts, I can create a booking no problem. I then close that view and try create another.

Now when I created the first booking, I create a new Booking. It gets and ID of 0; When I try create another booking

it tells me that it cannot attach the entity booking ID 0 because it is attached to another entityset.

I have tried everything I can think off. It seems that because the view does not get destroyed the domain context remains

active. Even when exiting the first booking I have asked it to detach the booking.

Any help will be great.

Thanks

Louis

Hi Louis,

Based on my understanding, this problem could be related to the one you described in this thread. Therefore, we could continue the discussion there.

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
